title: Cadence Teams Up With Coors on an Entire Apparel and Accessories Kit
content: Fans of the “yellow belly” Coors Banquet cans will dig this one. Cadence Collection recently teamed up with Coors to produce a capsule collection of co-branded merch, ranging from jerseys to socks, bottles to baselayers, and more. Head on over to Cadence to see the full drop.
author: prolly
